document_data.name: Chaldara Immerstar
document_data.mainbody: '''Chaldara Immerstar''' was an adventuress in [[Myth Drannor]] in the [[1370 DR|Year of the Tankard, 1370 DR]].
document_data.History:
Chaldara was a scribe at the temple of [[Tymora]] in [[Arabel]] but her hunger for adventure convinced her to leave. She helped some female warriors to defeat [[orc]]s near [[Mistledale]] when she was recruited to join the still-forming [[Company of the Catlash]].

In 1370 DR, the Company decided to go to Myth Drannor in order to acquire some magic items to empower them.
document_data.Activities: Chaldara was a long-standing member of the Company of the Catlash.
document_data.Personality: Chaldara wanted to live a life full of adventures until she could one day meet and marry a male cleric of Tymora and together start a new temple somewhere in [[Faer√ªn]] and a family.
